name: CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese
description: CDDA Kenan Mod 合集的汉化
author: linonetwo

scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run translate && npm run remove-buildin && npm run copy-readme
scripts.copy-readme: cp ./README.md ./Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/安装说明.md && cp ./docs/images/mod-folder.png ./Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/安装方法图示.png
scripts.clean: rimraf ./Kenan-Modpack-Chinese && rimraf ./error.log && rimraf ./log.log && rimraf ./public-dist && rimraf ./wiki/output && rimraf ./wiki/tiddlers/cdda
